actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce the tax on capital gains.
short_title: Venture and Equity Capital Revitalization Act of 1980

summary.text: Venture and Equity Capital Revitalization Act of 1980 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the capital gains deduction for individuals from 60 percent of the net capital gain to 75 percent.

titles.title: Venture and Equity Capital Revitalization Act of 1980
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce the tax on capital gains.
